boardgame.name: Illuminati
boardgame.description: Illuminati is a classic Steve Jackson (I) game of world domination. Each player takes on the role of a secret society attempting to spread its tendrils into special interest groups throughout the world._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game consists of three different cards (illuminati cards, group cards, and special event cards) and money. During a player's turn, a new card is drawn from a deck containing both group cards and special event cards. If it is a special event, the player in turn keeps the card and plays it when desired. If it is a group card, it is turned up along with any other face-up cards. The player in turn may then attempt to take over any group. This can be either a group on the table or a group already controlled by another player. If another player already controls the group it is more difficult to take it over, but not impossible._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;How difficult it is to take over a group depends on the strength of the controlling group, the resistance of the group being taken over, the proximity of the group being taken over to the controlling player's illuminati card (if someone already controls it), and other factors. Once this is determined, both the attacking and defending player can modify the odds further by spending _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;megabucks_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. Once a group is taken over, it has to be attached to the card structure the player already controls. How cards can be attached to each other is limited by in- and outbound arrows on the cards, and maintaining a well-structured tree of groups can be vital to success._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The winning condition for each player is different and depends on what illuminati card that player has._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This first edition contains 54 small black and white cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expanded by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Illuminati: Deluxe Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;CCG Version:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Illuminating the Post Office - Converting six groups to Illuminati._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Space Gamer (Issue 72 - Jan 1985)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Death to Deadheads! - Variant rules for Illuminati, The Evil Geniuses Are Here! - Variant new cards for Illuminati, More Groups Illuminated! - A couple more illuminated groups for Illuminati, The Monty Python Illuminati - The British Illuminati, 24 groups, and 3 special cards with a Monty Python theme._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; this is a package deal which contains the Original Illuminati in plastic case, along with the three expansions, all in the same plastic case. yes, they all fit! They are all complete. Buy them all now for one low price.
includes expansions 1 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; 2, some minor fold marks on a couple of cards, other wise in very good condition. Comes in plastic case.
Pocket Box edition.
BRAND NEW! Factory Sealed! MAILED IMMEDIATELY!

Deluxe Edition. Components in excellent condition, most of the money still unpunched and cards like new. Box is however pretty banged up, with a couple of creases on the edges, a caved-in bottom and a discolored cover (it looks like it was left in the sun for too long - it was that way when I bought it). Perfect for somebody who cares about a good game inside, but avoid if you want to display the box in a museum...

I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling the original game plus three expansions as a single set, hence the apparently high price. The _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;hook_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; on the original box has broken off (but who hangs game boxes anyway?) and the third expansion is unplayed and is in its original ziploc bag. In order to make sure the final price is correctly reflected, you should send a counteroffer for each of the four items, with a total of EUR 100!

by Laurin, 2nd edition, with black chips and yellow signs for the money, the one you can play with, hard to find in Germany, complete, cards like new, box has some minor wear from storage, in fact this is the German edition of Illuminati deluxe (incl. 2 expansions) weight: 586 gramme shipping: letter

Everything is present and in good condition. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m also selling the first expansion (and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d prefer to sell them together, as I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t work out which money chits came from the first expansion). Game is in excellent condition. All the components are present and correct.
Weight inc packing 230g UK First class £2.45 Surface Worldwide £2.64 Europe Airmail £3.15 USA Airmail £4.22
Shipping costs shown are for an individual game. I will combine shipping as best I can. Large packages (5kg, say 6 games) are very cost-effective to ship internationally via DHL. Ask if you want a detailed price.

Game has been played a couple times, all counters are present and accounted for and in good condition still. A little wear on the outside of the box from storage but otherwise in fantastic condition. Includes all instructions, manuals, and sheets.

Game is in very good condition. All the components are present and correct. The catches on the plastic box are still working fine!
Weight inc packing 220g UK First class £2.62 Surface Worldwide £2.84 Europe Airmail £2.95 USA Airmail £4.18
Shipping costs shown are for an individual game. I will combine shipping as best I can. Large packages (5kg, say 6 games) are very cost-effective to ship internationally via DHL. Ask if you want a detailed price.

Part of the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Reclaiming Home Auction_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. This listing is only for user Erniepaul Covers the purchase of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;James Ernest_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Totally Renamed Spy Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Illuminati_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;.

This is the 1983 version and includes expansion number 1. The original case is gone (thus the rating) - the cards, rules and tokens are intact and in good - excellent condition. I have made a nice box to store it in - so the game is not just loose. Box includes cover art. Great buy for someone wanting this original version of the game. Shipping will be actual cost.
WITH EXPANSIONS SETS 1 AND 2 Some rubber band oxidation marks on the two end cards of each set. Rules have some underlinings done neatly with a pen.

This is the original edition and includes the basic game and the expansion sets 1, 2 and 3 (I only sell the four items together for a total cost of 50 euros). All cards, megabucks, and the map and pieces from expansion set 3 have been laminated on both sides. Also included are some home-(computer-)made cards (like the three new illuminati from expansion set 3) and some illuminati paraphernalia (a cloisonne pin, an _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve been illuminated_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; button and a bavarian illuminati membership card).
Comes with expansion set 1 and 2.

Steve Jackson 1st edition 1982. Cards complete and in good condition, little sign of creases or marks ( there may be the odd money chit missing). Case intact. Postage £3.00 UK, Europe £10.00, USA £15.00

Illuminati and the first two expansions. Game supplied in the little-black-boxes for Expansions 1 and 2. (Sorry, no idea what happened to the original Illuminati box.) Postage £5 in the UK. Enquire elsewhere.
Unpunched
Earmarked for Charlie :) Spanish edition by Edge 2008, slightest box damage; contents barely used, sleeved cards.
